data.news_body:
This is to inform that the Board of Directors, inter alia, approved the un-audited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 30 June 2022 as
recommended by the Audit Committee at their respective meeting(s) held today, 10 August 2022.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Year Ended 31 March 2022
data.news_body:
In Compliance with Regulation 33 of SEBI ( LODR ) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its Meeting held today, 25 May 2022 have
inter alia:
1Approved the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and year ended 31 March 2022 and declared Dividend

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 31 Dec 2021
data.news_body: This is to inform that the Board of Directors, inter alia, approved the un-audited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 31 December 2021 as recommended by the Audit committee at their respective meeting(s) held today, 07 February 2022.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30 September 2021
data.news_body:
1. Pursuant to Regulation 23 ( 9) of SEBI LODR, we hereby enclose the disclosure of Related Party Transactions, for the half year ended 30 September 2021, drawn in accordance with applicable accounting standards.
2. We request you to take on records.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30 Sept 2021
data.news_body: 1. This is to inform that the Board of Directors, inter alia, approved the un-audited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30 September 2021 as recommended by the Audit Committee at their respective meeting(s) held today, 08 November 2021.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter Ended  30 June 2021
data.news_body:
This is to inform that the Board of Directors, inter alia, approved the un-audited financial results
(standalone & consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 30 June 2021 as recommended by the Audit committee at their respective meeting(s) held today, 13 August 2021..
1.1 The copies of the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results along with the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors thereon are enclosed herewith for
your records.

data.caption: Submission Of Disclosure Of Related Party Transaction
data.news_body:
1. Pursuant to Regulation 23 ( 9) of SEBI LODR, we hereby enclose the disclosure of Related Party Transactions, for the half year ended 31 March 2021, drawn in accordance with applicable accounting standards.
2. We request you to take on records.

data.caption: Approved  Financial Results And Declared Dividend
data.news_body:
1, The Board approved the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and year ended 31 March 2021.
2. The Board declared an interim dividend of 50 % (Rs. 5 per equity share)
